item.title: Get You a Free SSL Cert
item.author: river@ryc.one (River Yang)
item.description:
I like free stuff… well, who doesn’t?

I’m currently hosting this website with cloudflare CDN, so the certificate is free by default (Thanks so much Cloudflare!)

Well, but I still prefer something in control, or maybe encrypt some data or using v2ray ðŸ˜†
